title: Rate of recidivism among sentenced prisoner 2006 - 2013 , by number of sentences
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 4 lines denoting One sentence, Two sentences, Three to five sentences, and Six or more sentences. The y axis indicates the Rate of recidivism and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall One sentence, Three to five sentences, and Six or more sentences are gradually decreasing, Two sentences is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Six or more sentences, 2. Three to five sentences, 3. Two sentences, and lastly, 4. One sentence.
Throughout the period, Six or more sentences generally had the highest Rate of recidivism relative to others with an average of 75.25, and it reached its maximum at 2007 with a value of 79.0.
Followed by Three to five sentences which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 68.0 Rate of recidivism,reaching its highest point  at 2006 with a value of 72.0.
One sentence mostly had the least Rate of recidivism with a mean value of 42.0, which peaked at 2006 with a value of 49.0.
